about_the_game:
Send your heroes into the literal belly of the beast and to a floating dungeon with the Rogue Adventure - Otherworld Tileset! ELV Games continues their Rogue Adventure series with more tiles to help you build deadly dungeons to challenge your heroes! 1 A1, 2 A2, 2 A5, and 5 B sheets are ready to turn plain dungeons into squishy, bloody interiors or holy sanctuaries that exist in a magical subspace.

This pack also includes 7 character sheets and 3 large character sprites to add creepy movement to your maps and add lights and puzzle elements to break up your battle-filled dungeons. Each tile comes sized for Ace and MV/MZ, so you can use them in your favorite engine. Pick up the Rogue Adventure - Otherworld Tileset and create flesh-filled dungeons and mystical platforms that can help or hinder depending on your heroes’ choices!


Contents:

- Multiple type of walls, grounds
- Variation of colors
- Beast Interior tiles for your game!
- Lots of animated tiles including slimes, pulsating veins, bubbles, poison pool, portal, torches and more!


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
